item.title: [ERI1][Cooling System] - E102H08 / E102H09
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 10, 06:30 - 11:00 UTC

Apr 18, 23:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/05/2023 06:30 UTC
End time : 10/05/2023 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Racks will be unavailable during maintenance, we will only shut down one rack at a time and put it back into service before moving on to the next.
- E102H08 starts at 06:30 UTC and ends at 08:30 UTC
- E102H09 starts at 09:00 UTC and ends at 11:00 UTC
Service improvement : We need to perform preventive maintenance on our cooling system.

item.title: VPS - BHS2 - host373598
item.description:
May 6, 21:23 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 6, 20:59 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected switches

bhs-z2c2-a70

Affected racks

T04C19

Affected hosts

host373598

unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for

item.title: [RBX5][Network] - Rack 46E05
item.description:
May 6, 07:43 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/05/2023 07:29 UTC
End Time : 06/05/2023 07:41 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 6, 07:40 UTC
Update - Our technical teams resolved the issue for most of the impacted services.
We are hands on the remaining ones.

May 6, 07:36 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 06/05/2023 07:29 UTC
Service impact : Public network unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

item.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - GRA0326A06B
item.description:
May 5, 14:57 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/05/2023 13:30 UTC
End Time : 05/05/2023 14:20 UTC
Service impact : Servers in rack GRA0326A06B were temporarily unreachable
Root cause : Electrical issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 5, 14:02 UTC
Identified - Start time : 05/05/2023 13:30 UTC
Service impact : Servers in rack GRA0326A06B are temporarily unreachable
Root cause : Electrical issue
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
